details.title: DTFT-based frequency lock loop for GNSS applications
details.abstract: A frequency lock loop (FLL) for Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) applications is described here. The core element is the discrete time Fourier transform (DTFT), that leads to a maximum likelihood (ML) frequency estimation and can be conveniently implemented in a software defined radio (SDR) HW platform. The algorithm is based on the iterative evaluation of DTFTs in a single frequency until the incoming frequency is locked.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
